author: kfogel
msg: Continue work on issue #1510 (vendor branch support).
Issue #1510 recently absorbed two other issues
#1505 - handling unlabeled branches
#1474 - revision 1.1.1.1 is not always the same as 1.1
not because they're exact dups of #1510, but because their resolution
is required for vendor branch support anyway.  This commit fixes both
of them, but with some easy optimization left for #1474: we'll want to
notice when the deltatext of 1.1.1.1 is empty, and not commit a
spurious 'M'odification in that revision.  The deltatext_code changes
below are preparation for that optimization, but note that they aren't
actually used yet.  See also the adjustment to the 'simple_tags' test.
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(write_revs_line, parse_revs_line): Take and return new argument
deltatext_code.
(pass2, pass4): Adjust to handle new deltatext_code field.
(CollectData.define_revision): If this revision is on a branch
previously unheard of, then record the branch metadata now.
(CollectData.set_revision_info): Look for the default branch in
self.branch_names with confidence.
(is_vendor_first_revision): Remove this now unnecessary method.
(Commit.commit): Don't treat first vendor revision specially.
* tools/cvs2svn/run-tests.py
(simple_tags): Expect the T_ALL_INITIAL_FILES_BUT_ONE activity in
r39 instead of r38, as the inclusion of unlabeled branches has
changed the ordering a bit.  Expand r17 to expect a bunch of
spurious modifications, because we don't yet notice when the first
vendor revision is the same as the first trunk revision -- when we
do, we'll have to adjust this test back.
(enroot_race): Stop expecting the creation of /branches in r6, as it
will have already been created in r2 due to unlabeled 1.1.1.
* tools/cvs2svn/design-notes.txt: Document the new deltatext emptiness
indicator letter.

author: cmpilato
msg: Ignore 'utf-test', too

author: cmpilato
msg: Add a blank line after dumping file contents.
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py (Dumper.add_or_change_path)

author: kfogel
msg: * tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(CollectData.add_branch_point): Remove this unused method.

author: cmpilato
msg: Resolve issue 1255: recode filenames to UTF-8 before writing to dumpfile.
Patch(es) -- and amazing recipe! -- by Erik Hülsmann <e.huelsmann@gmx.net>.
Patch by: Erik Hülsmann <e.huelsmann@gmx.net>
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(Dumper class): Changed to encode path information when writing to
the dumpfile.
(Dumper.__init__): Copy encoding to new member path_encoding.
(Dumper.utf8_path): New. Recode path argument from path_encoding to utf-8.
* tools/cvs2svn/run-tests.py
(test_list): Make the 'nonascii_filenames' test no longer XFail --
we expect that sucker to pass now, baby.
